fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle.Hero

  • public class Hero
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Kayrak Gerland The heros will be chosen in a list of pre-create heros. They will be defined in sub-class The class heros is compounded of his name, his spells, (a picture) and a passive power which will impact warriors' characteristics.
